    • Uses of PowerUp in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL

      Subclasses of PowerUp in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AmmoIncrease
      AmmoIncrease is a subclass of PowerUp, and its purpose is to add an additional bullet to the player's ammunition cartridge.
      class  Invincibility
      A subclass of PowerUp, this class is used to set the player to an invincible state.
      class  Radar
      Radar is a subclass of PowerUp, and its main intention is to reveal the document that hides behind one of the rooms in the world.
